doc:
"Ada ""Bricktop"" Smith" https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ada_%22Bricktop%22_Smith 0 Ada Beatrice Queen Victoria Louise Virginia Smith, better known as Bricktop, (August 14, 1894 – February 1, 1984) was an American dancer, jazz singer, vaudevillian, and self-described saloon-keeper who owned the nightclub Chez Bricktop in Paris from 1924 to 1961, as well as clubs in Mexico City and Rome. She has been called "...one of the most legendary and enduring figures of twentieth-century American cultural history." Ada_Beatrice_Queen_Victoria_Louise_Virginia_Smith , better_known as Bricktop , ( August_14_,_1894 – February_1_,_1984 ) was an_American_dancer , jazz_singer , vaudevillian , and self-described_saloon-keeper who owned the_nightclub_Chez_Bricktop in Paris from 1924 to 1961 , as_well_as clubs in Mexico_City and Rome . She has_been_called " ... one of the_most_legendary_and_enduring_figures of twentieth-century_American_cultural_history .
